task.summary: Default task
Improving unpublished cheats card layouts etc.
Improving unpublished cheats card layouts etc.
Switching to coroutines (not working yet).
Remove cheat from list functionality (needs to be changed to coroutines) currently bug in removing one item from the list in MyUnpublishedCheatsListFragment.kt
Fixing the feature for removing an item from the unpublished cheats list. the list will remove the item and refresh with an animation.
Add app bar layout to toolbar layout xml file
Back arrow in actionbar in unpublished cheats list view added. Improved look of the card.
Code Cleanup
deleteUnpublishedCheat using COROUTINES: WORKING NOW
MyCheatsFragment berarbeitet, Layouts gefixt etc.
Changing style of FAB (now yellow (accent color) with black text)
Fixed the search for game button searchview layout.
Improved cheat submission form style, navigation drawer style improvement, display my published cheats works now.
Added my published cheat error handling, updated top member cheats list error handling.
Fixed crashes on screen rotation. Fixed bug for "edit and re-submit unpublished cheat". READY FOR RELEASE VERSION 2.5.15
Fixing the navigation drawer style! Gray background with blue item highlighting on selection.
Fixing the navigation drawer style! Gray background with blue item highlighting on selection.
Working Version 2.5.17! FIXED ON APP START CRASH (room database upgrade crashed -> favorites -> member_id NonNull)
Working Version 2.5.17! FIXED ON APP START CRASH (room database upgrade crashed -> favorites -> member_id NonNull)
Move RestApi object creation away from MainActivity to the child-fragments.
Displaying the amount of unpublished and published cheats int he "my fragments" view. Error in MainActivity when logging out, some fragments crash...
Fixing login/logout refresh behavior for "myCheats" view. logging out removes the count. Loggin in refreshes the drawer and fragment with the cheats count numbers.
Fixing strings.xml cheatList -> cheats Fixing favorites empty view bug Improving "my cheats" view with counter
Release Version 2.5.18 (+ library updates)
Make rejected cheat alertdialog less transparent Add bottom padding for unpublished cheats recyclerview
Fix favorites list data getting lost on display rotation. Add scrollview to "my cheats" view for better landscape mode.
STARTED (again) USING #HILT! This time it's working!
More migration to using HILT
Remove unused Helper.java and RestRepository.java classes.
Add NetworkModule class
